title: Unveiling Orthodoxy: Tripp and Luke
description:
Tripp and Luke discuss propositional knowledge, orthodoxy, and conversion/deconversion.

Practice of the presence of God: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/5657 

The Freedom of Self Forgetfulness: The Path to True Christian Joy https://www.amazon.com/Freedom-Self-Forgetfulness-Path-Christian/dp/1906173419

Is Everyone Female: https://www.commonwealmagazine.org/everyone-female 

Dreher Twitter Thread on Orthodoxy: https://twitter.com/roddreher/status/1236180157892882432

Theology and Openness: https://twitter.com/bobrobertsjr/status/1237762903572348929?s=20

Marshall Mcluhan Full lecture: The medium is the message: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ImaH51F4HBw
